statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 9 \\ 5 \\ -2 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ -15 \\ -11 \\ 2 \\ 17 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
